comment: I took her class last year and I enjoyed it. I did not like when class got canceled many times but she is a fun professor. I would take her again
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Beware of pop quizzes--Caring

comment: I would definitely take her again. I enjoyed it so far. It's easy you just have to pay attention

Cancelled class many times, some of which most of the class would still show up because she didn't let us know in time. Very strict with turn it in, and accused many people of cheating many times. However, always gave good feedback and was easy to ask for help and accessible. Very understanding and nice. Overall, a good professor.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class
